creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two-panel huipil with supplementary weft patterning and multicolored embroidered randa and blue velvet binding on neckline and armholes. Designs include zigzags, lozenges, and other geometric patterns in pink, blue, red, yellow, green, purple and white.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
